overview: Tonight, Cassie is anxious. Her husband asked her to get ready for a very special appointment. Only wearing a very short dress that shows her stockings, she will have to be attractive and vulgar at the same time. Cassie usually knows her husband's perverse games but what does he have in store for her tonight? A man is there with a camera to shoot the whole evening and bring the video of this mysterious party back to Cassie's husband. Watching his wife leave to a secret location in a luxurious car parked outside, he knows that she's about to have the experience of her life.
title: An Orgy for Cassie
